#   FacebookBot crawls public web pages to improve language models for our speech recognition technology.
#   Facebook claims to use polite web crawling protocols that respect standard robots.txt rules.
#   
#   You can identify traffic originating from the FacebookBot, either via its User-Agent string, or
#   its originating IP addresses:
#
#   FacebookBot uses the following user-agent string
#       Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; FacebookBot/1.0; +https://developers.facebook.com/docs/sharing/webmasters/facebookbot/)
#
#   You may also obtain a list of IP blocks utilized by FacebookBot by executing:
#       whois -h whois.radb.net -- '-i origin AS32934' | grep ^route
